pr_title: Add cosn UFS to provide better ability to read and write cos

timeline.bodyText: You can remove the version tag here, and maven can use the hadoop-cos definition from root pom.xml dependencyManagement.
timeline.author: maobaolong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,77 @@
+<!--
+
+    The Alluxio Open Foundation licenses this work under the Apache License, version 2.0
+    (the "License"). You may not use this work except in compliance with the License, which is
+    available at www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+
+    This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND,
+    either express or implied, as more fully set forth in the License.
+
+    See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for information regarding copyright ownership.
+
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.alluxio</groupId>
+    <artifactId>alluxio-underfs</artifactId>
+    <version>2.5.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>alluxio-underfs-cosn</artifactId>
+  <name>Alluxio Under File System - Tencent Cloud cosn</name>
+  <description>Tencent Cloud cosn Under File System implementation</description>
+
+  <properties>
+    <build.path>${project.parent.parent.basedir}/build</build.path>
+    <hadoop.version>3.1.0</hadoop.version>
+  </properties>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>com.qcloud.cos</groupId>
+      <artifactId>hadoop-cos</artifactId>
+      <version>3.1.0-5.8.5</version>

timeline.author: maobaolong
timeline.diffHunk:

+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.alluxio</groupId>
+    <artifactId>alluxio-underfs</artifactId>
+    <version>2.5.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>alluxio-underfs-cosn</artifactId>
+  <name>Alluxio Under File System - Tencent Cloud cosn</name>
+  <description>Tencent Cloud cosn Under File System implementation</description>
+
+  <properties>
+    <build.path>${project.parent.parent.basedir}/build</build.path>
+    <hadoop.version>3.1.0</hadoop.version>
+  </properties>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>com.qcloud.cos</groupId>

+      <version>3.1.0-5.8.5</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>com.qcloud</groupId>
+      <artifactId>cos_api-bundle</artifactId>
+      <version>5.6.19</version>

timeline.bodyText: If you want to specify the hadoop version for this ufs, you can use another property name other than this hadoop.version to keep difference to alluxio main framework. For example, cosn.hadoop.version
timeline.author: maobaolong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,77 @@
+<!--
+
+    The Alluxio Open Foundation licenses this work under the Apache License, version 2.0
+    (the "License"). You may not use this work except in compliance with the License, which is
+    available at www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

+    either express or implied, as more fully set forth in the License.
+
+    See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for information regarding copyright ownership.
+
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.alluxio</groupId>
+    <artifactId>alluxio-underfs</artifactId>
+    <version>2.5.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>alluxio-underfs-cosn</artifactId>
+  <name>Alluxio Under File System - Tencent Cloud cosn</name>
+  <description>Tencent Cloud cosn Under File System implementation</description>
+
+  <properties>
+    <build.path>${project.parent.parent.basedir}/build</build.path>
+    <hadoop.version>3.1.0</hadoop.version>

timeline.bodyText: As now, we have only one profile, and it is active by default, you can put these dependencies directly, when you need to define another profile, we can bring this back.
timeline.author: maobaolong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,193 @@
+<!--
+
+    The Alluxio Open Foundation licenses this work under the Apache License, version 2.0
+    (the "License"). You may not use this work except in compliance with the License, which is
+    available at www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+
+    This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND,
+    either express or implied, as more fully set forth in the License.
+
+    See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for information regarding copyright ownership.
+
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.alluxio</groupId>
+    <artifactId>alluxio-shaded</artifactId>
+    <version>2.5.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+  <artifactId>alluxio-shaded-cosn</artifactId>
+  <packaging>jar</packaging>
+  <name>Alluxio Shaded Libraries - Cosn</name>
+  <description>Shaded Cosn Module</description>
+
+  <properties>
+    <build.path>${project.parent.parent.basedir}/build</build.path>
+    <cosn.hadoop-cos.version>3.1.0-5.8.5</cosn.hadoop-cos.version>
+    <cosn.cos_api.version>5.6.19</cosn.cos_api.version>
+    <cosn.hadoop.version>3.1.0</cosn.hadoop.version>
+  </properties>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
+      <artifactId>log4j-api</artifactId>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
+      <artifactId>log4j-core</artifactId>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
+      <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
+      <artifactId>log4j-slf4j-impl</artifactId>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <profiles>

timeline.message: add underFileSystem of cosn for tencent cos
